{{Wired embedded system |brand=Allo |model=Sparky |price=37 |est_release_date=October 2015 |manuf_country=India |is_manuf=No |manuf=CEM Solutions Pvt |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=USB 2.0 Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Actions Semi |cpu1_model=S500 |cpu1_cspeed=1.1 GHz |fla1=0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646D-BYK0 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, eMMC module connector, |expansion_usb_num=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=CoreChips |eth_chip2_model=SR8201G |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PMU Audio Subsystem;Actions Semi;ATC2603C;;1;,,, USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;JFD;FE1.1s;;1;,,, |flags=Micro SD Card slot, HDMI, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, IR receiver, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.38;Ubuntu 12.04 |tp_firmware=Android 5.1, DietPi, Volumio, Max2Play |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=sparky |oui_eth=00:17:F7 }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://www.allo.com/sparky/sparky-sbc.html Product page]
*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/09/14/allo-sparky-board-supports-raspberry-pi-hats-for-multimedia-iot-and-voip-applications/ ''Allo SPARKY Board Supports Raspberry Pi HATs for Multimedia, IoT and VoIP Applications'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/low-cost-quad-core-cortex-a9-sbc-offers-expansion-shields/ ''Under $40 quad-core Cortex-A9 SBC offers expansion shields'' on '''LinuxGizmos''' ]
